name: Car Water Surfing Float Race
description:
Thrilling beach water surfing adventure is now here!

Download this stunt water surfer hero on the surfer board. Ride on the board and perform some stunts in the beach water surfing mania. Be stunt hero on the beach water. Perform some stunts and rescue all the victims in the sea. Complete all the rescue missions now.

Ride, drive and rescue on the beach water surfer. Be an expert beach water surfing hero in the surfing adventure. Complete all the challenges within the time limit. Cross all the hurdles now. Reach to the targeted finish by following direction through the arrow indicator. Enjoy different modes of the water surfer car stunts.

You don’t have much time! Be the ultimate ocean water surfer. You are the real stunt man. Select your favorite surfing board now. Rescue the victims on floating car beach surfer.

FEATURES
Extreme water surfing drive rescue simulator
Realistic 3D graphics and environment
Exciting levels for water surfing
Time and targeted based car stunts simulator
Different water car surfer for the rescue adventure
